document_data.name: Hvalspyd
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Hvalspyd''''', meaning '''Whale Spear''' in the [[giant language]], was a [[frost giant]] long ship captained by [[Drufi]].
document_data.Description:
The ''Hvalspyd'' was 250 feet (76.2 meters) long. Its sails were made from the wings of a [[white dragon]].

with sails made from [[White dragon]] wings.
document_data.Crew: In addition to Drufi, the ''Hvalspyd'' had a crew of 20 frost giants.
document_data.History: After the [[Ordning (social structure)|Ordning]] was destroyed, [[Storvald|Jarl Storvald]] tasked Drufi and other frost giant captains with finding the ''[[Ring of Winter|Ice That Never Melts]]''. Drufi and her crew sailed the ''Hvalspyd'' down to [[Chult]], arriving around the time the [[death curse]] struck [[Toril]].
